ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard Mana???
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like he was cannidancing :) Shamans can do this.... you sit down to med, then when you see the mana/hp tick, ie both go up, you stand up, cast
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like he was cannidancing :)

Shamans can do this.... you sit down to med, then when you see the mana/hp
tick, ie both go up, you stand up, cast cannabalise (hp to mana) then sit
down again, before the next tick. The engine thinks that you have been
sitting the whole time so get get the mana from medding the whole time plus
the cannabalised mana..


----- Original Message -----
From: "Christopher Sanders" <christopher.sanders@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 6:40 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Bard Mana???


> hehe...maybe I'll give it a shot, next time I die. :)
>
> do u hav ne spair stuffs 4 me plx?
>
> :P
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Robert(Bob) Smith [mailto:rws1111@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2001 4:25 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Bard Mana???
>
>
> > Keep in mind, manasong, clarity, and other mana regen ...
> > things ... have no impact on the bards mana regen.
>
> Ummm... this is not quite true...
>
> While Gaelthorne is now retired (his player no longer playing EQ,) he
> found out that singing "I'm a little teapot..." while alternating
> sitting and standing between pulses of manasong DID make his mana
> regen increase.
>
> Could one of you test and see if this is still true?
>
>
> Be well,
>
> Gaelthorne
> Xegony
